entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
